name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Temu Download | both Image & Video Downloader

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly save time by quickly downloading product images or bundling them into a convenient zip file for bulk retrieval.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your image downloading experience with the Temu Hi-Res Image Downloader, a user-friendly extension designed for the Temu website. This plugin simplifies the process of obtaining main, variant, and description images, allowing you to effortlessly organize them into subdirectories. Additionally, you can opt to save your downloads in a convenient zip format for seamless storage and management. Whether you need to download a single image or multiple images in one go, the Temu Download Plugin has your image retrieval needs covered. Try it today and witness the ease it brings to your image downloading journey.

▬▬▬▬▬ FEATURES ▬▬▬▬▬

FREE version:

- Main image downloads
- Variant image downloads
- Highest image quality

PRO version:

- Description image downloads
- One-click download for all image types (main, variant, description)
- Highest image quality available
- Streamlined organization with subdirectories
- Quick access to the download folder
- Option to save images in .ZIP format

▬▬▬▬▬ CONTACT ▬▬▬▬▬

If you have any questions or suggestions to enhance the app, please feel free to reach out to us at temu.toolkit@gmail.com
